definition[0]: someone who has been officially suggested for an important position, duty, or prize
example[1]: a nominee for the post of vice president
definition[1]: someone who has been suggested for a job, position, or prize
example[2]: Board nominees must be approved by shareholders.
definition[2]: a person or organization that holds shares, bonds etc for someone
example[4]: What is there to prevent a taxpayer from putting his shares in the name of a nominee?
definition[3]: in LIFE INSURANCE, the name of the person who will get money if the insured person dies
